sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'
import { Box, Typography, TextField, InputBase, Grid } from '@mui/material'

import avatar from '../../../../public/assets/Avatar1.svg'
import TypographyComponent from '../../Atoms/Typography/TypographyComponent'
import Avatar from '../../Atoms/Avatar/Avatar'
import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core'
import Icon from '../../Atoms/Icon/Icon'

const container = {
  width: '676px',
  height: '379px',
  backgroundColor: '#FFFFFF',
  boxShadow: '0px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)',
  marginTop: '10px',
}
const imageBox = {
  alignItems: 'center',
  justifyContent: 'center',
  paddingTop: '27px',
  paddingLeft: '28px',
  paddingRight: '28px',

  backgroundColor: '#FF6161',
}

const avatarBox = {
  borderRadius: '0%',
  paddingLeft: '10px',
  height: '157px',
  width: '159px',
  boxSizing: 'border-box',
}

const nameBox = {
  alignItems: 'center',
  justifyContent: 'center',
  display: 'flex',
  flexDirection: 'column',
  paddingTop: '37px',
  paddingLeft: '25px',
  paddingRight: '40px',
}

const inputBox = {
  alignItems: 'center',
  justifyContent: 'space-between',
  paddingRight: '80px',
  paddingTop: '38px',
  marginLeft: '73px',
  fontFamily: "Roboto",
      fontSize: "50px",
      fontWeight: 700,
      fontStretch: "normal",
      fontStyle: "normal",
      lineHeight: "48px",
      letterSpacing: "normal",
      color:'#2C2937'
}
const inputBox1 = {
  alignItems: 'center',
  justifyContent: 'space-between',
  paddingRight: '80px',
  paddingTop: '38px',
  marginLeft: '73px',
  fontFamily: "Roboto",
      fontSize: "12px",
      fontWeight: 400,
      fontStretch: "normal",
      fontStyle: "normal",
      lineHeight: "18px",
      letterSpacing: "normal",
      color:'#5A5766'

}

export type alphaCardProps = {
  userName: string
  designation: string
  heading: string
  description: string
}



const AlphaCard: React.FC<alphaCardProps> = (props) => {
  const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({
    avatar1: {
      width:'136px',
      height:'136px',
      border:'2px solid #7E64F3'
    },
  }))
  
  const classes=useStyles()
 
  return (
    <>
      <Grid container sx={container}>
        <Grid item xs={4} sx={imageBox}>
          <Box sx={{ position: 'absolute', top: '0px' }}></Box>
          <Box sx={avatarBox}>
<Icon imageSrc={avatar} classname={classes.avatar1, classes.avatar2}></Icon>
          </Box>
          
          <Box sx={nameBox}>
            <TypographyComponent
              text={props.userName}
              variant="caption"
              color="#FFFFFF"
            ></TypographyComponent>
            <TypographyComponent
              variant="caption"
              text={props.designation}
              color="#FFFFFF"
            ></TypographyComponent>
          </Box>
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={8}>
          <Box sx={inputBox}>{props.heading}</Box>
          <Box sx={inputBox1}>{props.description}</Box>

        </Grid>
      </Grid>
    </>
  )
}

export default AlphaCard
